Name: Olsen-banden
Description: Egon Olsen's criminal trio always gets itself into unlucky, comical situations when executing Egon's genius plans. After release from prison, Egon already has a new plan: steal a valuable German item from a secured museum in Copenhagen.

Name: Olsen-banden på spanden
Description: His friends are there, when Olsen is released from prison. He's resocialized. The 3 work at a toy factory, then cleaning at Denmark's central bank. When a US gang robs the bank, the 3 have to clear their names.

Name: Olsen-banden i Jylland
Description: At the end of WWII, a German general hid a fortune in a bunker on the west coast of Jutland. The Olsen gang and co. venture all the way from Copenhagen to find the treasure. They're not alone.

Name: Olsen-bandens store kup
Description: Olsen has a plan - rob over DKK4,000,000 from an armored car with police escort using a hot dog stand, some ducks etc. Can the gang hide the money safely?

Name: Olsen-banden går amok
Description: No one picks Egon Olsen up after 8 months in prison. Benny and Kjeld now work at a grocer. Egon decides to steal the DKK6,000,000+ from a criminal's safe alone, before the cops raid the place.

Name: Olsen-bandens sidste bedrifter
Description: The Olsen gang is on vacation in Spain. They've run out of money so Egon Olsen has a plan. Leaving prison in Denmark, he joins the big time without his 2 friends. Will they help Egon, when he gets conned?

Name: Olsen-banden på sporet
Description: After the Olsen Gang's money is stolen in Spain, Egon is arrested once more. Back in Denmark, they want to steal a railroad car full of gold bars to get their money back.

Name: Olsen-banden ser rødt
Description: Egon Olsen and his 2 friends are hired to stage the theft of a Ming vase. He's double-crossed by the baron and wants revenge by swapping the Ming vase with a cheap copy during a big party at the castle. Will they succeed?

Name: Olsen-banden deruda'
Description: Benny, Keld and computer savvy Georg await old Egon Olsen at his release from prison. Egon has a new plan - theft of USD10,000,000 in Copenhagen. It involves the EEC's (before EU) butter mountain.

Name: Olsen-banden går i krig
Description: There are top secret plans of turning Denmark into EEC/EU's "holiday park". The Olsen gang plans to steal and sell the plans at DEM10,000,000. After being double-crossed, will patriotism win?

Name: Olsen-banden overgiver sig aldrig
Description: After his recent stay at Vridslose State Prison, Egon Olsen is back with a new plan. This includes breaking into the EU headquarters in Bruxelles, Belgium and even stealing a tank!

Name: Olsen-bandens flugt over plankeværket
Description: Money's needed for Kjeld's silver wedding and Egon Olsen has an ingenious plan - steal a red bag with DKK5000000 from the crooked VP of Denmark's largest insurance company. Will Egon survive it?

Name: Olsen-banden over alle bjerge
Description: Egon Olsen has a plan. After several plans/attempts at the gang getting the red bag with compromising documents on illegal int'l arms deals, will they succeed in Paris?

Name: Olsen-bandens sidste stik
Description: After being arrested in a psychiatric institute for almost twenty years, Egon Olsen escapes and reunites his gang for a last and final coup.
